00029 #ifndef __TBB_aligned_space_H
00030 #define __TBB_aligned_space_H
00031 
00032 #include "tbb_stddef.h"
00033 #include "tbb_machine.h"
00034 
00035 namespace tbb {
00036 
00038 
00040 template<typename T,size_t N>
00041 class aligned_space {
00042 private:
00043     typedef __TBB_TypeWithAlignmentAtLeastAsStrict(T) element_type;
00044     element_type array[(sizeof(T)*N+sizeof(element_type)-1)/sizeof(element_type)];
00045 public:
00047     T* begin() {return internal::punned_cast<T*>(this);}
00048 
00050     T* end() {return begin()+N;}
00051 };
00052 
00053 } // namespace tbb 
00054 
00055 #endif /* __TBB_aligned_space_H */
